scripts.BuildProjectLinux: npm install && python -m venv Aivenv && source Aivenv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd front_end && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && exit 1
scripts.BuildProjectWindows: npm install && python -m venv Aivenv && Aivenv/Scripts/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd front_end && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && exit 1
scripts.Build: cd front_end && npm run build && cd .. && exit 1
